processed.result: You are given a prime number $x$ and an array of non-negative integers $a_1, a_2, ..., a_n$.  Calculate the greatest common divisor (GCD) of  $x(a_1 + a_2 + ... + a_n)$ and $(a_1 + a_2 + ... + a_n)$.  Print the GCD modulo $10^9 + 7$.

Given a prime number and an array of non-negative integers, find the greatest common divisor of the sum of the array elements and the product of the prime number and the sum of the array elements. The result should be modulo 1000000007.
